nodes.bodyText: Right - we should add a unit test for this behavior of MsalBrokerRequestAdapter so that we don't require a manual test in order to catch it next time.

nodes.bodyText: Agreed. @tanmaymanolkar1 I suggest you create a work item in your backlog to add a unit test for this. I don't think we necessarily have to do it right now as I don't want to block the release process.
